003892BF.desc:
{c_gold}Cooldown: {/c}{c_green}{Cooldown Time}{/c}
You become lightning incarnate. While in this form, you are {c_white}Immune{/c}, enemies around you are continually shocked for {c_yellow}{payload:ZAP_DAMAGE}{/c} and you can surge quickly between locations.

2827F416.Buff0_Description: You can shock and surge through enemies.

F2DE8628.simple_desc: Ultimate Skill: You become lightning incarnate, making you an invulnerable, lightning-fast threat.
